extends Property
implements java.io.Serializable

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResidentialProperty

        public ResidentialProperty​()
        Creates an instance of this object with default values

      • ResidentialProperty

        public ResidentialProperty​(long id,
                           java.lang.String legalDescription,
                           java.lang.String address,
                           java.lang.String quadrant,
                           java.lang.String zone,
                           double askingPrice,
                           java.lang.String comments,
                           double area,
                           double bathrooms,
                           int bedrooms,
                           char garage)
                    throws InvalidLegalDescriptionException,
                           InvalidNumberOfBathroomsException
        Creates an instance of this object with a specified list of initial values.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the property
        legalDescription - legal description of the property
        address - address of the property
        quadrant - quadrant of the property
        zone - zone of the property
        askingPrice - asking price of the property
        comments - comments on the property
        area - the area of the property
        bathrooms - the number of bathrooms of the property
        bedrooms - the number of bedrooms of the property
        garage - a char which has a value of 'a', 'd' or 'n' representing attached, detached or no garage
        Throws:
        InvalidLegalDescriptionException
        InvalidNumberOfBathroomsException

      • validateNumberOfBathrooms

        private void validateNumberOfBathrooms​(double bathrooms)
                                throws InvalidNumberOfBathroomsException
        Method to validate the number of bathrooms end in either .0 or .5 and if it does not then the method throws an InvalidNumberOfBathroomsException
        Parameters:
